00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_time.h"
00029 
00030 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionAntiCtcpFloodData
00031 {
00032 public:
00033         KviIrcConnectionAntiCtcpFloodData();
00034         ~KviIrcConnectionAntiCtcpFloodData();
00035 protected:
00036         // ctcp antiflood mechanism
00037         kvi_time_t   m_tLastCtcp;                  // the time we have received the last "may flood" ctcp request
00038         unsigned int m_uCtcpCount;                 // the ctcp counter for the antiflooder
00039 public:
00040         kvi_time_t lastCtcpTime(){ return m_tLastCtcp; };
00041         unsigned int ctcpCount(){ return m_uCtcpCount; };
00042         void setLastCtcpTime(kvi_time_t tLastCtcp){ m_tLastCtcp = tLastCtcp; };
00043         void increaseCtcpCount(){ m_uCtcpCount++; };
00044         void setCtcpCount(unsigned int uCtcpCount){ m_uCtcpCount = uCtcpCount; };
00045 };
